title: History of p5.js and Creative Coding
description: An interactive timeline tracing the evolution of creative coding tools from Design By Numbers at MIT Media Lab to the modern p5.js library.
subject: Mathematics
topic: History of p5.js and Creative Coding
author: Dan McCreary
learningObjectives: Understand the mathematical concept of history of p5.js and creative coding
Apply history of p5.js and creative coding to solve problems
Visualize and interpret history of p5.js and creative coding relationships
Test understanding of history of p5.js and creative coding through interactive exercises
